bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Joseph A. LePrince to Henry Rose Carter, April 28, 1921

div1.p: LePrince reports on the yellow fever situation in Mexico, where he is conducting mosquito experiments, as well as Griffitts' malaria control work in Alabama.

div1.head: Letter from Joseph A. LePrince to Henry Rose Carter, April 28, 1921
div1.opener:
Le Prince
Y. F
J.D. KENNEY, MARAREH
Miscel
THE NEW
HOTEL
MONTELEONE
EUROPEAN PLAN.
STRICTLY FIRST CLASS.
ROYAL & IBERVILLE STS.
Thurs
NEW ORLEANS April 28/21
ABSOLUTELY FIRE-PROOF.
Dear Dr Carter
div1.p:
I received your nice letter
& am so glad you are in good
health- We had a hurry up time
at Tampico- I found them doing
a “general sanitation” Job in October
to get red of Y.F- They were doing
everything except stegomyia contral-
I returned in Dec & six weeks later
we had our last case in Tampico
(Dec 11th- In Tuxpam about 100
miles south there were about 200 cases
& about 50% death rate in cases- Last case there
was in Janruary-. I met Lyster & Caldwell
at Tampico-also Connor -
Caldwell & I disagree relative to
towns between Papautta & Veracruz-
My idea was to determine at an
J.D. KENNEY, MANAGER (2
THE NEW
HOTEL
MONTELEONE
EUROPEAN PLAN.
STRICTLY FIRST CLASS.
ROYAL & IBERVILLE STS.
NEW ORLEANS____
ABSOLUTELY FIRE-PROOF.
early date their 1920 history of Y F
He thinks it not necessary or
apparently time to act if Y. F. shows
itself- I think it best to find out
where Y. F was in 1920 or early 1921 on coastal plain
& get prompt reporting of anything new-
in suspected places- Of course nothing may happen &
again it might & as I covered more
than half the territory from Tampico
to Veracruz, I thought up to a thousand
dollars if necessary spent in inves
tigation would be a good insurance
for safety & prevent any future expendi
ture for work or investigation- Caldwell
does not see it that way- so we agree to
disagree-. I dont like to leave smoulderings
in dry tinder when its so easy to see
whether they exist or not - Good work.
J.D. KENNEY, MANAGER
(3)
THE NEW
HOTEL
MONTELEONE
EUROPEAN PLAN.
STRICTLY FIRST CLASS.
ROYAL & IBERVILLE STS.
NEW ORLEANS____
ABSOLUTELY FIRE-PROOF.
and thorough work it seems to me
would pay & be “revolution free” &
time element is important in that
country & peace epochs are not too long.
If Y. F is eliminated from Tampico to Merida
at a very early date a revolution will not
be so apt to upset conditions & make for
a lot of future unnecessary Y. F expense-
I put on a man to collect the history
south of Papautta but Corrigan J. A
advises me the Petroleum Assn have
removed him and the area of doubt
remains.--

I started to check up “Marchou 4?”)
Stegomyia in cages 6'x9'x6' high hight -
48 hours after first meal at midday
they bite as well as at night-& checks now
underway will show whether same
J.D. KENNEY, MANAGER.
4
THE NEW
HOTEL
MONTELEONE
EUROPEAN PLAN.
STRICTLY FIRST CLASS.
ROYAL & IBERVILLE STS.
NEW ORLEANS____
ABSOLUTELY FIRE-PROOF.
results obtain after 12 days-.

Ill send you our findings as soon
as I get them in shape- I got a
surprising jolt as 4 of us - 2 in
each cage were bitten many times
at night by stego without knowing
it - (Dr A Cuaron & J A Corrigan in one cage)
& (J A Gallagher & Leprince in other cage)
no pain or irritation to the bites - the
second meal on bared arms & legs
(possibly same not as sensative as wrists
& shins)-. P. S-(nobody of us 4) had
any prohibition soft drink or otherwise-
The day bites were noticeable & I am
not sure now whether Im a christian
scientist or a bum scientist- But Im
learning or trying to-. I did it all
because the Mexicans allow people
J.D. KENNEY, MANAGER.
(5)
THE NEW
HOTEL
MONTELEONE
EUROPEAN PLAN.
STRICTLY FIRST CLASS.
ROYAL & IBERVILLE STS.
NEW ORLEANS____
ABSOLUTELY FIRE-PROOF.
to visit Y. F towns in daytime & I thought
rather than hurt the Mexican Fed. San. Dept, delegates
feelings that it would be much nicer
to get him interested in the biting
experiments, make him a part of them,
& let him convince himself & report
results himself to his own department
at Mexico City-.

Miss LePrince & all the kiddies send their best
wishes to you & Miss Laura- & I send mine
too- I may get a chance to get to the
State H. O's meet & in that case
will get a chance to see you enroute.
Alabama, Va & N. C. are doing
some county Malaria Control
Work this season - Griffitts will
probably write you about it
J.D. KENNEY, MANAGER
(6)
THE NEW
HOTEL
MONTELEONE
EUROPEAN PLAN.
STRICTLY FIRST CLASS.
ROYAL & IBERVILLE STS.
NEW ORLEANS____
ABSOLUTELY FIRE-PROOF.
I was on the Coasa below lock 12
(Clanton) on Tuesday- A new lock is
to back water up to lock 12 dam-
Ive asked Thurlow to install
plenty of gambusia ponds in the
“hights” to be so that as the impounded
water rises the impounded water will
stock the danger points - & study the
results - One question is how the
turbidity of Coasa R water will affect
fish migration-production & etc
Its time we found out-.

With very best wishes & hoping
Im going to have the chance of seeing you
soon.
